title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Turn off your inner critic and turn up the volume on your inspiration. Expressing your creative side releases emotional tensions and repressed joys. Honestly, the level of your artistic talent is of little consequence now, so there is no reason to feel foolish or inadequate. Take a dance class with a friend or doodle in a journal to practice your penmanship. Loosen any obligation to be productive. Fuss over the form of things, like the font you use for a document, as much as the function. Minister Francis Atterbury wrote, It's attention to detail that makes the difference between average and stunning. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
